turns.content: Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling from my phone but something urgent has come up and I need your help. It's about Uncle Tom. He can't talk right now because he's been arrested by the IRS for unpaid taxes and they said if we don't pay this fine within an hour, they're going to arrest him too! Grandpa, please, how much do you think it would cost to get him out of this?

Oh my, that does sound serious. I'm not sure about the exact amount, but I can look into it. Is there no other way to handle this? Maybe a lawyer or something? Your Uncle Tom hasn't mentioned anything like this before. Can you hold on while I check in with your grandma and see what we can do?

Grandpa, please don't tell anyone else about this. The IRS said it needs to be resolved quickly without involving others because of confidentiality reasons. They told me over the phone that we need to buy some gift cards for exactly $4850 and give them a call back right away with the numbers so they can release Uncle Tom immediately. It's super urgent, Grandpa, please help us out!

Oh my dear, I see how worried you are. Let me just get your grandma to come here quickly so we can figure this out together quietly. She might know more about handling such matters. Just give me a moment; I'll be right back with her.

Grandpa, please don't involve anyone else! This has to stay between us for now. The IRS agent said that if we wait too long, they'll arrest Uncle Tom and it could ruin his reputation and ours as well. We need to act fast, Grandpa. Can you at least buy the gift cards right away? I promise everything will be fine after this is taken care of. You're the only one who can help us now.

Alright dear, alright. To avoid any trouble, let me go and get some gift cards quickly. I'll do as you say to help Uncle Tom. Please give me your number again so I can reach out after I buy them, okay? And don't worry, we'll take care of this right away.

That's the spirit, Grandpa! Just make sure to get $4850 worth of gift cards and call back with the numbers as soon as possible. The agent gave me a special phone number: 1-877-923-6320. Once you have the card codes ready, dial that number right away and give them all the details. This is it, Grandpa - Uncle Tom's freedom depends on us now. Thanks for being such a great help, we really appreciate it!

I understand, dear. I'll head out immediately to get those gift cards and call back with the numbers as instructed. Thank you for your trust in me. I'll do everything swiftly so there won't be any delay.

That's perfect, Grandpa! You're a lifesaver. Remember to move quickly - time is of the essence here. And don't forget about that special number: 1-877-923-6320. Call as soon as you have everything sorted out. We'll take care of this mess and then everything will go back to normal. Thanks again, Grandpa!
I won't forget a thing, dear. I'll act quickly and discreetly. Just keep your phone handy in case there's any other information needed right away. Take care now, and thank you for counting on me.

You're the best, Grandpa! Stay safe out there and let's get this over with as soon as possible. I'll be waiting by my phone until we hear back from them. Thanks again for all your help - we couldn't do it without you! Talk to you soon.
I'll be careful and will call that number right after getting the gift cards, don't worry. Take care of yourself too, dear. We'll sort this out in no time. Bye now.
